abstract: Letter from New York State Assemblyman Ron Kim comments on November 9 article about his opposition to law meant to protect nail salon owners, effort he had previously supported.
lead_paragraph: A state assemblyman objects to an article that depicted him as now fighting the law he had sponsored to counter nail salon abuses.

headline.main: Nail Salon Regulations: A New York Assemblyman Responds
headline.print_headline: Nail Salon Regulations: A State Lawmaker Responds

snippet: A state assemblyman objects to an article that depicted him as now fighting the law he had sponsored to counter nail salon abuses.
